column30: This is a large plaza with several seating areas. Art sculptures are featured along with diverse landscaping.
Plaza located on Mission Street along the rear of the building. Some planters with benches.
The open space connects Stevenson Street and Jessie Street, including planter boxes, a water fountaing, and seating with table outside the cafe.
This is a two level open space, with granite wall water fountains at the sidewalk level near Market Street and a view to the landscaped space on the second level.
This open space is a through walkway between Fremont and 1rst Street that opens into an interior plaza.  A farmers market was operating on location.
This is a sunken plaza, landscaped with flowers and small water fountains. Escalators are provided to this space.
Built with marble, and covered with glass, this greenhouse provides ample seating and tables.
Well landscaped walkway with seating and tables.
This urban garden include a water feature combined with a tall art piece. Seating available on the ledeges of raised water feature.
Plaza with seating along planters.
Interior lobby with seating open business hours only.
Landscaped seating area located kitty-corner to 301 Howard.
Plaza with no seating.
A cul-de-sac walkway with benches at the end.
Open plaza with minimal seating on the edge of planters.
This plaza is located on 2nd. Street and Stevenson. Seating is only available on the steps beyon the table and seating provided for the food establishment.
An open plaza with some seating, landscaping and planters.
Open plaza with two benches and a gated children's play area through to Spear Street.
An open plaza between buildings with benches, trees and some landscape materials.
This extensively landscaped urban park offers redwood trees at the foot of the Transamerica Pyramid. It features, a tall water fountain, sculptures, and ample seating.
Plaza and wrap around walkway with seating along planters.
This Urban Garden is either accessed through the front entrance of the building or a narrow walkway on Front Street. This space offers water fountains, landscaping, and art.
Concrete seating streches along the passage that connects the recessed entrance of Golden Gate University to the sidewalk on Mission Street.
Wrap around plaza area with seating near food services.
Plaza with high planters that provide some landscaping but no seating.
Snippets surrounding the hexagonal fence of Montgomery Bart Station sunken plaza. This space include concrete steps with some planter boxes.
Large well landscaped plaza with many seating options.
Extensive landscaping combined with water features signify this space between two high rises. Seating,however, is only availabe to employees.

This open space is elevated with the street slope. A large art piece represents one entrance to the open space on California Street. This space surrounds the building and offers seating on the ledges of planter boxes.
Brick plaza with some trees, artwork and seating on brick structures.
Initially hidden from street view there is seating along the building setback area to the right as you walk toward the door.
This Urban Garden provides a sunken space featuring a water fountain. Space is accessed with stairs from Bush Street and curved walkways from Market street.
